name: flappyblock
description: Online multiplayer of Flappybird, block version

scripts.install-all: (cd shared && npm install) && (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install) && npm install
scripts.start: (cd client && npm start) && (cd server && npm start)
scripts.build: (cd server && npm run build) && (cd client && npm run build) && (cd shared && npm run build)
scripts.build-all: export NODE_ENV=production && (cd shared && npm run build-prod) && (cd server && npm run build-prod) && (cd client && npm run build-prod)
